downloadTitle: System Center 2025 Management Pack for Linux Operating Systems
downloadDescription: System Center 2025 Management Pack for Linux Operating Systems

downloadFile.name: Microsoft System Center 2025 MP for Linux.msi

detailsSection:
The Linux Operating Systems Management Packs enable discovering, monitoring, and managing Linux computers with System Center Operations Manager 2025. They provide both proactive and reactive monitoring of the Linux operating systems. The management packs monitor components such as processes, resources, and server agents. The monitoring provided by the management packs includes availability and configuration monitoring, performance data collection, and default thresholds. You can integrate the monitoring of Linux components into your service-oriented monitoring scenarios. In addition to health monitoring capabilities, the management packs include reports, diagnostics, tasks, and views that enable near real-time diagnosis and resolution of detected issues. The management packs also enable the installation of the Audit Collection Services for Linux Management Packs.

Feature Summary: System Center 2025 Management Pack for Linux Operating Systems
  • Provides monitoring of the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 & 8 operating systems.
  • Provides monitoring of SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12, and SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 operating systems.
  • Provides monitoring of OpenSUSE Linux Leap 15 operating systems.
  • Provides monitoring of CentOS 7 operating systems
  • Provides monitoring of Debian GNU/Linux 9, Debian GNU/Linux 10, and Debian GNU/Linux 11 operating systems
  • Provides monitoring Oracle Linux 7 and Oracle Linux 8 operating systems
  • Provides monitoring of Ubuntu Linux Server 16.04, Ubuntu Linux Server 18.04, Ubuntu Linux Server 20.04 operating systems
  • Enables the installation of the Audit Collection Services for Linux Management Packs
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft System Center 2025 MP for Linux.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported SCOM Versions
System Center Operations Manager 2025
Monitoring of following Operating Systems is supported: RHEL 7, 8, 9 SLES 12, 15, Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04, 20.04 Debian 9, 10, 11 CentOS 7, Oracle Linux 7, 8. OpenSuse Leap 15
installInstructionSection:
1. Download and install System Center Operations Manager 2025
2. Download and install the updated management packs
3. Import the management packs for the monitored Linux server types.
4. Use the Operations Console to upgrade the Linux agents in the Administration/Linux computers view.
